name: The Line TD
description:
Give your Tower's Elemental Abilities!

- Poison your enemies!
- Slow them!
- Be greedy and plunder more Gold!
- Do as much damage as possible!


Elemental Abilities can be enhanced every 3rd Round


Carve your own Line!

-Choose which path the game should follow to maximize your Tower's effectiveness


How far can you go?
-Decide the difficulty yourself with the Difficulty slider
